scripts.pip:install-required: pip install fastapi uvicorn gunicorn transformers
scripts.torch:install-windows-cu121: pip3 install torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121
scripts.torch:install-windows-cu118: pip3 install torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu118
scripts.torch:install-linux-cu118: pip3 install torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu118
